Chordate/Smokescreen:


Chordate sighed.  "Yeah, sure.  Make me do all the work..." he muttered, 
ending the comm. conversation.  "Defenses, stand down, Chordate 
authorization."

The defenses deactivated.

Chordate entered the Cybertronian Fire, waiting for Battera.  "Please follow 
me, I will take you to some temporary quarters so you can wait for Kluster if 
you like."
